definition: soup/hot or boiling water/decoction of medicinal herbs/water in which sth has been boiled
woman who looks after small children/(old) female tutor

sentences.english: Rhona Rogers had been friends with Sally Thompson for more than 20 years.
sentences.chinese: 羅娜“羅傑斯和薩莉”湯姆遜是20多年的朋友了。

sentences.english: J. J. Thompson, model. Rutherford, experimental data.
sentences.chinese: 湯姆遜，模型，盧瑟福，數據。

sentences.english: He far preferred Rutherford to Thompson.
sentences.chinese: 相比湯姆遜他更喜歡盧瑟福。

sentences.english: Now let's invite Prof. Tomson to speak to us.
sentences.chinese: 現在請湯姆遜教授講話。

sentences.english: The operation remained focused on traditional cathode-ray-tube TVs until this year.
sentences.chinese: 但湯姆遜直到今年仍專注於傳統的陰極射線管電視機。
